adjectives.description: islandish (comparative more islandish, superlative most islandish)

entries.meaning: (rare) Pertaining to or characteristic of an island; insular.
examples: He being, of himself, so bent: As, purposing, first, Inuincibly to Fortify the Chiefest and Vttermost Walls of his Ilandish Monarchy, against all Forreyn Encombrance possible […].
